RelatedSentence: ( OTC Pink : TEXC ) ( the Company or TexCom ) , an environmental services company serving the oil and gas industry , today announced that it will hold its 2014 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on Thursday , June 26 , 2014 .

( OTC Pink : TEXC ) ( the Company or TexCom ) , an environmental services company serving the oil and gas industry , today announced that it will hold its 2014 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on Thursday , June 26 , 2014 .
TexCom , headquartered in Houston , Texas , is a growth - oriented environmental services company with a primary focus on the disposal of nonhazardous wastes generated by the oil & gas industry .
